result.eng: Three are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.

result.ga: Céad euro an duine sa tseachtain

result.eng: Two of them are very big but the other one is very small.
result.ga: Tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheag
result.orig: Tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheag

result.eng: The kitchen and sitting room are one room.
result.ga: Tá an chistin agus seomra suite mar sheomra amháin
result.orig: Tá an chistin agus seomra suite mar sheomra amháin

result.eng: I have my lunch between one and two.
result.ga: Bíonn mo lón agam idir a haon agus a dó
result.orig: Bíonn mo lón agam idir a haon agus a dó
result.html: Bíonn mo lón agam idir a haon agus a dóI have my lunch between one and two.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn mo lón agam idir a haon agus a dóI have my lunch between one and two.

result.eng: I'm very tired after work but I go out one or two nights.
result.ga: Bím an-tuirseach tar éis na hoibre ach téim amach oíche nó dhó
result.orig: Bím an-tuirseach tar éis na hoibre ach téim amach oíche nó dhó
result.html: Bím an-tuirseach tar éis na hoibre ach téim amach oíche nó dhóI'm very tired after work but I go out one or two nights.
result.ponchtml: Bím an-tuirseaċ tar éis na hoibre aċ téim amaċ oíċe nó ḋóI'm very tired after work but I go out one or two nights.

result.eng: One night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.
result.ga: Oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlár
result.orig: Oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlár
result.html: Oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlárOne night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.
result.ponchtml: Oíċe aṁáin ṁoṫaiġ sé go raiḃ sé á ṫaċtaḋ agus ṫit sé ina ċnap ar an urlárOne night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.

result.eng: One of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ga: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.orig: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.html: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ponchtml: Rinne duine aṁáin drannaḋ liom agus ḃraiṫ mé ċoṁ beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.

result.eng: 'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ga: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.orig: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.html: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag teaċt faoinár ndéin liúiġ duine de na fir óga agus ḃí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.

result.eng: Well, you'll be made a saint one day!
result.ga: Muise déanfar naomh díot go fóill
result.orig: Muise déanfar naomh díot go fóill
result.html: Muise déanfar naomh díot go fóillWell, you'll be made a saint one day!
result.ponchtml: Muise déanfar naoṁ díot go fóillWell, you'll be made a saint one day!

result.eng: They left the airplane and went inside the other one.
result.ga: D'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eile
result.orig: D'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eile
result.html: D'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eileThey left the airplane and went inside the other one.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág siad an t-eitleán agus ċuaiġ isteaċ sa ċeann eileThey left the airplane and went inside the other one.

result.eng: It seems she only had one duty.
result.ga: Ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúil
result.orig: Ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúil
result.html: Ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúilIt seems she only had one duty.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ aċ dualgas aṁáin uirṫi is cosúilIt seems she only had one duty.

result.eng: I remember one thing I did.
result.ga: Is cuimhin liom rud amháin a rinne mé
result.orig: Is cuimhin liom rud amháin a rinne mé
result.html: Is cuimhin liom rud amháin a rinne méI remember one thing I did.
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin liom rud aṁáin a rinne méI remember one thing I did.

result.eng: He remembers an incident that happened one day.
result.ga: Is cuimhin leis eachtra a tharla lá
result.orig: Is cuimhin leis eachtra a tharla lá
result.html: Is cuimhin leis eachtra a tharla láHe remembers an incident that happened one day.
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin leis eaċtra a ṫarla láHe remembers an incident that happened one day.

result.eng: It is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ga: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.orig: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.html: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ponchtml: Is trua naċ raiḃ JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a ḃí ag an gceann a ṫáinig roṁainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.

result.eng: One [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.
result.ga: Shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama é
result.orig: Shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama é
result.html: Shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama éOne [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.
result.ponchtml: Ṡíl láiṫreoir aṁáin naċ raiḃ eitleán ar biṫ i gceist agus go mba ḃuama éOne [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.

result.eng: While I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ga: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
result.orig: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
result.html: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime domWhile I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ponchtml: Agus mé ag breaṫnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo ḃí rud aṁáin ag déanaṁ scime domWhile I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...

result.eng: And if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ga: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.orig: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.html: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobhAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ponchtml: Agus dá mba ḃuama é caiṫfiḋ gur ċeann ollṁór é a ṗléascfaḋ an foirgneaṁ amaċ ar ḋá ṫaoḃAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.

result.eng: Then, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ga: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.orig: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.html: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ponchtml: Ansin nóiméad roiṁ a deiċ a ċlog i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫarla tubaiste naċ raiḃ aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.

result.eng: They carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.
result.ga: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sinThey carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.
result.ponchtml: Rinne siad ionruaṫar ar an Iaráic bliain go leiṫ ina ḋiaiḋ sinThey carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.

result.eng: They started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ga: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.orig: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.html: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ponchtml: Ṫoisiġ siad a ṁagaḋ ar Ṡeimí a rá leis gurb í a ḃeaḋ mar ṁnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.

result.eng: As soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ga: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.orig: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.html: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ponchtml: Aon uair aṁáin a ġeiḃ duine ciall tá deireaḋ aige le haoiḃneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.eng: It was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ga: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.orig: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.html: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ponchtml: Ba doilig ḃeiṫ ina gcuideaċta gan a ḃeiṫ mar ḋuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.

result.eng: They all made a promise to one another.
result.ga: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.orig: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.html: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug 'aċ aon duine acu láṁ is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.

result.eng: He was one foot in the grave.
result.ga: Bhí cos amuigh is cos istigh san uaigh aige
result.orig: Bhí cos amuigh is cos istigh san uaigh aige
result.html: Bhí cos amuigh is cos istigh san uaigh aigeHe was one foot in the grave.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cos amuiġ is cos istiġ san uaiġ aigeHe was one foot in the grave.
